table.name: its4you_dynamicfields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_dynamicfields` ( `dfid` int(11) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `module` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `conditions` longtext NULL, `deleted` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `follows_up_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `road` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `show_popup` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `seq` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `isgroup` int(2) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`dfid`), KEY `module` (`module`), KEY `deleted` (`deleted`), KEY `follows_up_id` (`follows_up_id`), KEY `road` (`road`), KEY `show_popup` (`show_popup`), KEY `seq` (`seq`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_dynamicfields_blocks
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_dynamicfields_blocks` ( `dfid` int(11) NOT NULL, `block` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `visible` int(2) NOT NULL, KEY `dfid` (`dfid`), KEY `visible` (`visible`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_dynamicfields_errors
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_dynamicfields_errors` ( `dfid` int(11) NOT NULL, `error_text` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dfid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_dynamicfields_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_dynamicfields_fields` ( `dfid` int(11) NOT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `visible` int(2) NOT NULL, `mandatory` int(2) NOT NULL, KEY `dfid` (`dfid`), KEY `visible` (`visible`), KEY `mandatory` (`mandatory`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_dynamicfields_fields_groups
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_dynamicfields_fields_groups` ( `dfid` int(11) NOT NULL, `fieldsgroup` int(11) NOT NULL, `visible` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `mandatory` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `dfid` (`dfid`), KEY `fieldsgroup` (`fieldsgroup`), KEY `visible` (`visible`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
